articles.title: Microsoft starts automatically redirecting Internet Explorer users to Edge
articles.description: Microsoft is starting to redirect Internet Explorer users to Edge. It’s part of the end of support for IE, after nearly 27 years.
articles.content: Microsoft will start automatically redirecting Internet Explorer users to its Edge browser over the next few months. Internet Explorer is being retired today, and consumers or businesses still using the browser will start to see a prompt soon that wi... [2146 chars]

articles.description: YouTube today announced a new Corrections feature that lets creators easily highlight any errors in their videos. Read on to learn more.

articles.title: Boris Johnson using Jedi mind trick on country over economy, says Starmer
articles.description: Labour leader says PM is spouting nonsense, telling people ‘they’ve never had it so good’, in bad-tempered PMQs
articles.content:
Keir Starmer has accused Boris Johnson of trying to fool the public with “nonsense” about a booming economy, as an often bad-tempered prime minister’s questions saw the pair square up over stagnant growth and tax rises.

articles.title: Smell training: Essential oils that may help regain your sense of smell after a COVID-19 infection
articles.description: Long COVID has become very common in patients who experience mild to severe coronavirus infections. It refers to the lasting impact of the virus weeks and months after recovery.
articles.content:
